User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

QuoteRequest.title: QuoteRequest
QuoteRequest.description: Represents a quote request submitted by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the quote request.

userId.description: The ID of the user who submitted the request.

serviceType.description: The type of service the quote is for (e.g., electrical installation, machinery repair).

description.description: A detailed description of the service requested.

contactName.description: Name of the person requesting the quote.

contactEmail.description: Email address of the person requesting the quote.

contactPhone.description: Phone number of the person requesting the quote.

requestDate.description: Date and time when the quote request was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the quote request (e.g., pending, processing, completed).

params.name: userId
params.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores quote requests submitted by users.  Each document represents a single quote request.

params.name: quoteRequestId
params.description: Unique identifier for the quote request.
